## bandwidth
* graphclasses.org: [bandwidth](https://www.graphclasses.org/classes/par_25.html)
* [â†—](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_bandwidth) (paraphrased) Label graph vertices with distinct integers. Bandwidth of this labelling is the maximum over label differences over all edges. Bandwidth of a graph is the minimum over all labellings.
